class.name: SoundbankReader
class.javadoc: A SoundbankReader supplies soundbank file-reading services. Concrete subclasses of SoundbankReader parse a given soundbank file, producing a {@link javax.sound.midi.Soundbank}object that can be loaded into a {@link javax.sound.midi.Synthesizer}. 1.3 Kara Kytle

Obtains a soundbank object from the URL provided.
url URL representing the soundbank.
soundbank object
InvalidMidiDataException if the URL does not point to valid MIDI soundbank data recognized by this soundbank reader
IOException if an I/O error occurs

Obtains a soundbank object from the InputStream provided. stream InputStream representing the soundbank soundbank object InvalidMidiDataException if the stream does not point to valid MIDI soundbank data recognized by this soundbank reader IOException if an I/O error occurs

Obtains a soundbank object from the File provided. file the File representing the soundbank soundbank object InvalidMidiDataException if the file does not point to valid MIDI soundbank data recognized by this soundbank reader IOException if an I/O error occurs
